from core.progressive_supervisor import ProgressiveAnalysisEngine
import logging

# 로깅 설정
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)

print(''=== Progressive Supervisor 8개 에이전트 테스트 ==='')
try:
    engine = ProgressiveAnalysisEngine()
    print(f''초기화 성공: {len(engine.execution_order)}개 에이전트 실행 순서 설정'')
    print(''실행 순서:'')
    for i, agent in enumerate(engine.execution_order, 1):
        print(f''  {i}. {agent}'')
    
    print(''\n모든 에이전트가 execution_order에 포함되었는지 확인:'')
    expected_agents = [''context_expert'', ''sentiment_expert'', ''financial_expert'', 
                      ''advanced_technical_expert'', ''institutional_trading_expert'', 
                      ''comparative_expert'', ''esg_expert'', ''community_expert'']
    
    missing_agents = set(expected_agents) - set(engine.execution_order)
    if missing_agents:
        print(f''누락된 에이전트: {missing_agents}'')
    else:
        print(''✓ 모든 8개 에이전트가 실행 순서에 포함됨'')
        
except Exception as e:
    print(f''오류: {e}'')
")
